body_html: In fact, I am a little bit confused about this. Now we have 2 attendances for each team - first and second options preferences. But we also have to confirm it (what sounds more like an attendance). So, in this case, the attendance model has two meanings: Confirm attendance and save team preferences.

body: In fact, I am a little bit confused about this. Now we have 2 attendances for each team - first and second options preferences. But we also have to confirm it (what sounds more like an attendance). So, in this case, the attendance model has two meanings: Confirm attendance and save team preferences.
